short_description: ffolkes offshore is a boats services & dealer based in aberdeen, united kingdom.
long_description:
marine support & logistics - ffolkes offshore ltd is a uk-based full service ships agency providing marine support & project logistics to the offshore and maritime industry. founded by a leadership team with over 30 years of agency and maritime experience, ffolkes is configured to resource and deliver cost effective solutions globally, meeting the most demanding client requirements. ffolkes offshore provides tailored solutions to suit the world's most challenging offshore markets, placing the highest priority on the safety of our operations, staff and subcontractors. meeting exacting international standards, our safety and environmental management systems are designed to ensure a strong and proactive safety culture throughout our organisation. servicesships agency – marine logistics – crew travel – project & heavy lift cargo – mobilisation management - purchasing & freight support
registered in scotland sc359340operations@ffolkesoffshore.com24hr contact number : +44 (0) 1224 953 100atlantic house, 25 commerce street, aberdeen, uk, ab11 5fe

generated_description: ffolkes offshore ltd is a uk-based full-service ships agency that specializes in providing marine support & project logistics to the offshore and maritime industry. the company was founded by a leadership team with over 30 years of agency and maritime experience. ffolkes is committed to delivering cost-effective solutions globally, meeting the most demanding client requirements, and providing tailored solutions to suit the world's most challenging offshore markets. the safety of their operations, staff, and subcontractors is their top priority, and they have safety and environmental management systems designed to ensure a strong and proactive safety culture throughout their organization. their services include ships agency, marine logistics, marine transport contracting, vessel and crew management, project and heavy lift cargo, mobilization management, personnel outsourcing, and brokering of offshore, marine, and oilfield equipment.
